title: Organizing Your Digital Assets For Your Retirement, Estate and Beyond
description: Assets don't just include cash, investments and real estates. In today's world, assets include social media accounts, documents and cryptocurrencies. MarketWatch’s retirement reporter Alessandra Malito and Everplans’ founder Abby Schneiderman discuss how to keep it all organized - and why it's so important to do so for your retirement and estate plans.
